passive_skill.effect: Activates the Entrance Animation when there are another 2 or more "Tournament Participants" Category allies or another "Universe 6" Category ally on the team upon the character's entry: (Once) Chance of evading enemy's attack 20% up, DEF 160% up and launches an additional Super Attack for 6 turns; (Once) Ki +2 and ATK & DEF 200% up; (Once) High chance of performing a critical hit; (Once) High chance of evading enemy's attack; (Once) Launches an additional attack that has a great chance of becoming a Super Attack; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 100% up; For every attack performed: ATK 60% up within the turn; For every attack evaded: DEF 60% up and chance of evading enemy's attack 6% up within the turn; Every time the character performs 3 or more Super Attacks in battle: Attacked enemy's ATK & DEF 30% (up to once within a turn); Seals the attacked enemy's Super Attack (up to once within a turn); Interrupts the attacked enemy (up to once within a turn); When the target enemy is in the following status: HP is 60% or less, , , or: ATK 60% up; Attacks guaranteed to hit
